## FlipClockProps type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type FlipClockProps<T extends Face<T>> = {
    autoStart?: boolean;
    emitter?: EventEmitter<FaceHooks<T>>;
    face: T;
    theme?: Theme<T>;
    timer?: Timer | number;
    el?: Element | null;
};
```
